resources.string: We\'ll be learning how to adjust TalkBack\'s reading controls, which lets us make TalkBack read and navigate in different ways. TalkBack has reading modes, such as word-by-word, and navigation modes, such as jumping from header to header. When you change modes, TalkBack will speak the mode you switched to.
To change your mode, swipe up and down in one motion. Take your time to cycle through all the choices.
You can go backwards through the list. Swipe down then up in one motion to go through the list in the opposite direction.
Modes can also be switched by swiping with three fingers horizontally to the left or to the right.
That\'s all there is to changing modes. The rest of this lesson covers how to use these modes. Activate the button below to finish this module.
The \"Controls\" reading mode allows jumping between buttons, sliders, switches, and other interactive things.
Switch to the Controls reading mode and swipe down to jump to the control at the end of the page.
You performed the wrong action. Please try again.
This element will push you back
